text: In France, the Répertoire national des certifications professionnelles was created by article L. 335-6 of the Education Code. It makes available to individuals and businesses constantly updated information on educational degrees and certificates on the lists established by the national commissions. It helps to facilitate access to employment, human resources management and mobility. RNCP - Répertoire National des Certifications Professionnelles Certifications stored in the directory are recognized throughout the country. Consultation du Répertoire national des certifications professionnelles (RNCP) Under the authority of the Minister for Vocational Training, the Commission nationale de la certification professionnelle establishes and updates the répertoire national des certifications professionnelles. It ensures the renewal and adaptation of diplomas. Degrees are classified by field of activity and level. Diplomas are classified according to the levels of training approved by decision of the permanent group of vocational training and social advancement. == References == == Other websites == *Répertoire national des certifications professionnelles Official website Category:Education in France Category:2002 establishments in France
title: Répertoire national des certifications professionnelles
